startDate.desc: Date at which the simulation starts

endDate.desc: Date at which the simulation ends

useSecondaryYieldOn.desc: Switches the utilisation of secondary yields off

nitrogenResponseOn.desc: Switches the crop nitrogen response off for potential growth simulations

waterDeficitResponseOn.desc: Switches the crop soil moisture response off for potential growth simulations

emergenceMoistureControlOn.desc: Switches the seed response to soil moisture off for simulations with unknown initial conditions

emergenceFloodingControlOn.desc: Switches the seed response to flooded surface off for simulations with unknown surface slope

percentageFC.desc: Initial soil moisture content in percent field capacity

delayInDays.desc: the delay in days for next dressing if calculated amount couldn't be used up in top dressing
